divs: Sighting Details I Was out side looking at the stars and saw three objects with four lights just hovering they moved in like a flash movement and hovered agian. i've seen this several times before but never really paid this any attention untill i seen this several times it keeps me woundering if this is ufo activity. Being that fort bragg and camp mccall is near i was afraid to say anything about this. the ufo's would always be in diffrent places in the sky with the same type of activity a flah like movement and then hovering. I would go inside my house and look out the window and still see the ufo's. I was afraid so i would say to myself that's not a ufo so i would go to bed. the next night i was outside and saw the same thing agian. It is now 2011 and the month of june and july is comming so i may see these ufo's agian. i've lived here for eleven years and every once in a while i would see these objects winter and summer. what really made me notice the objects is when the lights flashed and the objects moved in a flash like movement. i thought that the objects were a military type of craft and i know a moving plane when i see it. These objects are always the same and the movements are the same.
Summary: Two small crafts one large in the middle four lights on each red blue and yellowish orange
